comment: My big dumb not-a-foreign-policy person question : if the US killed Soleimani , isn't that a massive act of war ? I feel like if the Revolutionary Guards killed Petraeus in , we would've been bombing Tehran within hours .
amr:
# ::snt My big dumb not-a-foreign-policy person question : if the US killed Soleimani , isn't that a massive act of war ? I feel like if the Revolutionary Guards killed Petraeus in , we would've been bombing Tehran within hours .
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (q / question-01
            :ARG0 (ii / i)
            :ARG1 (a / act-02
                  :polarity -
                  :ARG1 (w / war-01)
                  :mod (m2 / massive)
                  :condition (k / kill-01
                        :ARG0 (c / country
                              :name (n / name
                                    :op1 "US"))
                        :ARG1 (p / person
                              :name (n2 / name
                                    :op1 "Soleimani"))))
            :mod (b / big)
            :mod (d / dumb))
      :snt2 (f / feel-06
            :ARG0 ii
            :ARG1 (b2 / bomb-01
                  :ARG0 (w2 / we)
                  :ARG1 (c2 / city
                        :name (n3 / name
                              :op1 "Tehran"))
                  :time (a2 / after
                        :quant (u / up-to
                              :op1 (m3 / multiple
                                    :op1 (t / temporal-quantity
                                          :quant 1
                                          :unit (h / hour))))
                        :condition (k2 / kill-01
                              :ARG0 (m4 / military
                                    :name (n4 / name
                                          :op1 "Revolutionary"
                                          :op2 "Guard"))
                              :ARG1 (p2 / person
                                    :name (n5 / name
                                          :op1 "Petra")))))))

comment: It ll be a free-for-all . Israel , America , the Saudis , the Emiratis , Iran , Turkey , Syria , Hezbollah , and Russia are all running around the region , guns out and no trigger discipline .
